      • validateGlobalConstraints

        public Collection<ComponentValidationDiagnostic> validateGlobalConstraints(IBranchPath branchPath,
                                                                           Collection<String> globalValidationConstraintIds,
                                                                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
        Description copied from interface: IComponentValidationService
        Validates a bunch of IGlobalConstraint instances given with their unique IDs.
        Specified by:
        validateGlobalConstraints in interface IComponentValidationService<C extends IComponent<String>>
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the branch path.
        globalValidationConstraintIds - a collection of constraint IDs that has to be used for the validation. Others are ignored.
        monitor - the monitor for the process.
        Returns:
        a collection of diagnostics as the outcome of the validation process.
